game.name: 大学物语
game.shortDescription: "University Story" is a college simulation game where you play as a freshman. Experience family, friendship, and love over four years in university. How will you balance studying, socializing, and daily life? What kind of person will you become ? Every choice you make shapes your future!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "University Story" is a college simulation game where you play as a freshman. Experience family, friendship, and love over four years in university. How will you balance studying, socializing, and daily life? What kind of person will you become ? Every choice you make shapes your future!
